column4: Guys, sometimes my system has a few odd glitches, which seem to, in a way or another, to fix themselves. But i want to know whats wrong. For example, sometimes i get odd messages about my audio drivers, and my computer starts to get a bit slow. Isnt there a place somewhere thats registering everything thats going on in Ubuntu? ..im not quite sure in what i mean but...perhaps you can enlighten me?
is there a way to do it directly through the terminal?
well you can just less or grep any of the files in /var/logs/
